dcterms:creator: Y. LeCun
L. Bottou
Y. Bengio
P. Haffner
dcterms:description: The MNIST dataset is a collection of handwritten digits used for training various image processing systems. It is widely used for benchmarking machine learning algorithms.
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:creator: G. Cohen
S. Afshar
J. Tapson
A. van Schaik
dcterms:description: EMNIST is an extension of the MNIST dataset that includes handwritten letters, providing a larger dataset for training and testing machine learning models on character recognition.
dcterms:title: EMNIST
